about_the_game:
Jiri Janouch has been involved in music all his life, as a composer, producer, sound engineer, and guitarist. While guitar remains his greatest passion, he has a particular love of extraordinary instruments.

Born in Prague, Jiri has composed music for films and commercials, as well as composing songs for leading Czech and Slovak pop stars. In fact, he collaborates with the most famous Czech band, Lucie. He is also the main author of music for the shows Vivaldianno and iMucha, on which Pierce Brosnan was a narrator. Jiri plays in many bands and still performs.

His passion for new technologies and exploring new channels led him to produce the music for his first game, The Last Oricru. This is a new frontier for Jiri, yet a logical next step for a man dedicated to delivering a moving and immersive musical experience.

The Last Oricru soundtrack was recorded at FirstFloorStudios in Prague.
detailed_description:
Jiri Janouch has been involved in music all his life, as a composer, producer, sound engineer, and guitarist. While guitar remains his greatest passion, he has a particular love of extraordinary instruments.

Born in Prague, Jiri has composed music for films and commercials, as well as composing songs for leading Czech and Slovak pop stars. In fact, he collaborates with the most famous Czech band, Lucie. He is also the main author of music for the shows Vivaldianno and iMucha, on which Pierce Brosnan was a narrator. Jiri plays in many bands and still performs.

His passion for new technologies and exploring new channels led him to produce the music for his first game, The Last Oricru. This is a new frontier for Jiri, yet a logical next step for a man dedicated to delivering a moving and immersive musical experience.

The Last Oricru soundtrack was recorded at FirstFloorStudios in Prague.

name: The Last Oricru Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 135 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1200 MB available space

short_description: The Last Oricru Original Soundtrack produced by Jiri Janouch lets you relive your favorite game moments anytime, anywhere. Sit back, relax and let the 35 tracks of powerful, moody and edgy scenic music take you back into the wonderful world of Wardenia.
